Posts.Content: Mom22teenz wrote: Ok last Friday I woke up with a pain and aching in my left breast and then of course there was this small pea sized lump in the aerola.I called my dr and he gave me some Augmentin to take for it,and he told me to take some IB every 4-6 hrs.Ok now here is the thing,the pain is centralized in my aerola and so is the lump,and the the breast is still soft but my nipple itches profusely.Does anyone have any advice ? maybe even what it sounds like,I dont have periods anymore,taking Estradiol ..
